replies.body: So no more champion themes/ login animations? I dont like this

So don't use the feature. It's optional. Just don't click the checkmark.

I don't plan to use it, but I think its great for those that want it to have the option.

It says “it’ll free up the art and music teams for more projects,” so it looks like there simply won’t be animated login screens with music anymore.

Hopefully they’ll still have champion themes, even if they aren’t in the login screens...
Maybe "more projects" includes a movie? I doubt it but I can hope.
I seriously doubt the same people who were animating login screens have the same skills as those who would make a movie

While I'm kinda sad about this as well... the animations take a lot of effort to make and I'd rather their time go directly into other things that won't disappear after a few weeks. However... I think I'm most sad about the login music. Some brilliant things went into those and as a sound engineer those always blew me away.

What I don't like is having 10 billion animations in the client resulting in my computer taking a dump just trying to get into a game.

But I do agree, the champion themes in the past have been quite spectacular.
This is extremely disappointing. I loved animated loging screens and the music. It's something I hold very dearly to my overall league experience.

Good news, you can just not click the checkbox! You can still get your screens and music =) 

I too enjoy the music.
They are discontinuing animated screens and the music that accompanies them entirely.
Have you tried actually fixing the client issues we care about (ie. crashes, no lock in champ select causing us to dodge, etc...)? Instead of distracting us with this?
Logged in just to upvote this. New client has been hell.

So this is why Yuumi never got a login screen? Sorry to say, I would really rather still get the login animations. I love seeing a champion come to life and also love using the animations as backgrounds/screensavers....Getting rid of this because SOME people MIGHT use the auto login is kinda...scummy?

Come on. You, me, and everyone else are going to use it. You know that. I know that. All this means is we can get more projects like the K/DA event. People are impatient. Instant login is a good thing. Everyone here just wants to complain about something and that's all there is to it.

I think while it’s true most people will use the auto-login feature from here on out, it’s also really saddening to see we won’t be getting animated login screens and champion music themes anymore. That was a highly anticipated feature of champion releases and I think it’s highly valid to feel disappointed by this change. Hell I was really looking forward to seeing what they’d do with Quinn’s new theme once she got her VGU; that’s not even a possibility anymore though.

This just means they will have more time and resources to make more fully fleshed out animations instead of worrying about both the login screens AND the video animations. I think being able to get in the game faster is worth it.
so no much in client, but does that mean no champion music at all? i hope not plz. the music team is one of only ones thats loved by most fans and does no wrong
What about if you have more than one account? Will you have a log out option that will take you to the original log in screen?
I'd like to know about this too. No more closing client when trying to switch between accounts please...

They should allow you to be logged into multiple accounts with quick switching like Google, for instance. But that obviously appeals mainly to people with smurfs, which I'm not sure Riot wants to make life easier for.

"Next game" 
Make it an MMO set in Runeterra with all our lovable champions. And have crossover events and missions :)
How does this effect public Internet / gaming lounges?

"This change also frees up the art and music teams to put more time into other exciting projects."

Hey Riot...wtf? No more music or animated splashes? Those are some of the best parts of the game. This is a mistake.

Ummm.... you just posted a contradiction. 
Riot: Music team will work on other projects.
You: NO MORE MUSIC WUTTT?
This would have been a great time to add a log out button.

I'm not really a fan of Yuumi myself, but she still deserved a login.  

But now it looks like no one gets one from hereon out. 

:(
Interesting! I will miss the login music! I always thought every single intro theme was fantastic. How will it work for gamer couples with only one computer, switching between accounts?

So if I may ask, is the **Saved Login Credentials** feature going to be mandatory or do we have the option of opting out of it? While I understand that this feature will simplify things & make it easier to login, there are some players that enjoy listening to the Music at the login screen.

You can opt out of the feature, but there will no longer be background music on the log in screen. 

> Because you'll skip the login screen once you've stored your credentials and get into game quicker, we're going to have them include static images **without background music.**

I'm sure things are subject to change and nothing is finalized, but that's the current plan.
Reading is hard for people, Critz. They were too busy typing in their credentials.
No one is talking about the support for their next game
I just want it to remember my password. I still enjoy the login themes and music!
This is not worth the loss of the login screens.
I assume there will be a way to logout with this?

It’s a no from me. I would never click “Stay signed-in”. I love Login Screen of League. I love the songs that are playing during Login Screen and their animations are cool too. I personally think Login Screens are one of the charming aspect of League. Maybe other people would need it, but to me personally, I’ll just sign in by typing my everything while listening to them songs.
So many seem to be missing the fact that they are removing the songs/ animations whether you use the feature or not.
Don't know what kind of toasters people like you run the game on but I've hardly had issues across multiple computers and specs. Hey, at least you have warm bread.
My question is, if you like the login screens but still prefer less typing can you save your Username?
Are you asking if that feature will still be here? Because I too would like for that feature to remain available, its something I use frequently.

This is tangentially related but why was the behavior of the surrender window changed in the latest patch.  Will it be reverted, why wasn’t it listed in the patch notes?  If this is the desired default can an option be added to get the old behavior back
So I've gotten the new client pushed through, but my good friend who lives maybe an hour away hasn't. Any ideas as to why that is?

Client is completely unnecessary.
What are you doing to your game??
removing all modes except SR & teamfight tactics, let us have access to all modes all the time. I miss dominion.
Please stop ruining your game....
So is this feature now on live server? because my client just got the update and I am able to skip login every time now

Please DO NOT go forward with this. I need login screens I don't care about saved login credentials and I won't go to youtube just to experience a champion theme song. This will surely make the game feel more disconnected and lifeless
I enjoy the login screen animations and I don't want it to go plus I'm looking forward for a Yuumi animation *cough*
Just fix the entire client then start making more features.
Millions of players did not login to post a comment on this announcement.

Lazy Riot games single handedly ruining their game by doing things no one asked for. Everyone loves animated login themes why in the hell would you remove those??!?!? Literally ruining your game by doing this
I've disabled animations and music for so long. Good but I'm logging in.
